content.raw: The ABI is being modified here, since we are under 1.0, that is ok for versioning. The problem is that we are build other software on top of ignition (haptix-comm) so remember me to rebuild haptix-comm or any other software built on top of ignition when releasing this change
content.html: The ABI is being modified here, since we are under 1.0, that is ok for versioning. The problem is that we are build other software on top of ignition (haptix-comm) so remember me to rebuild haptix-comm or any other software built on top of ignition when releasing this change
